event.title: Regular bi-weekly edu meeting fsfe group Berlin (online)
event.body: On the 25th of March at 19:30 (CET) the local FSFE Berlin group hosts one of their regular meetings. This time it is themed around "Free Software in the educational sector" (edu) meeting. Together they discuss the state of Free Software in the educational sector. The meeting is open for everybody and needs no registration. It will be held online.
